Articles.Content:
So, I just got KSP and I'm gonna post how I am learning how to play.

Part 1: PLANES!

So, I found myself a stock plane out on the Runway, seeing as this was my first time flying damn near anything (I have tried the demo, never got in orbit.) I learn from Youtubers and the wiki alike. I used an ordinary stock aircraft and got liftoff. Hell yes! I kept flying and then something caught my eye. To my right, I saw an island. The closer I got, I found that there was a runway! I flew in for a landing. I knew I was probably gonna explode, and IF I learned anything from Danny2462, if I EVA at the right time, lil' ol' Jebediah would live! No need to EVA, though, I only lost ONE control surface upon landing! First landing, and I was proud of it.

More on KSP soon. Post feedback!

Welcome to KDP, beside the trial version!

Surelly, there is a LOT of differences.

First, you learned there it is the Island Runway , where you can land with a plane...

Think about when you'll arrive at Jool...

Welcome to KDP, beside the trial version!

Surelly, there is a LOT of differences.

First, you learned there it is the Island Runway , where you can land with a plane...

Think about when you'll arrive at Jool...

Jool? That gas giant with about 3 moons? Pfft. I will start small. Transcontinental rocket flight on Kerbin, then land on the Mun. Then Minmus. Then maybe Duna. THEN I will consider Jool.
lol, yeah, I have been doing ksp for a while, and I still have not gone to Jool yet! not even a robotic mission!

Part 1.5 (DEMO VERSION): Continental flight. (SHORT)

I dedcided to play the demo a bit. I tried out a design, that I named the Bullet. I aimed it north, and I burned some fuel. I ran out, but landed at a nice place in the mountains. Planted a flag.

Note:The next part will be quite long, presumably.

Flame's Checklist

Continental Flight (COMPLETED)

Achieve Orbit (COMPLETED)

Mun Landing (IN PROGRESS)

Minmus Landing (NOT STARTED)

Mun Rescue (NOT STARTED, MAY NOT BE NEEDED)

Minmus Rescue (NOT STARTED, MAY NOT BE NEEDED)

Duna Encounter (NOT STARTED)

Duna Landing (NOT STARTED)

Duna Rescue (NOT STARTED, MAY NOT BE NEEDED)

Space Station (COMPLETED)

Enter the Jool system (NOT STARTED)

Land on one of Jool's moons (NOT STARTED)

Edited November 25, 2015 by The Flame Cat

I have plans for my transcontinental flight. And jeb is stuck on the runway.

Idk how to post a picture sooooooooooo....

So, after pickin up good ol' Jeb. I started on a transcontinental flight. I failed miserably.

About time to attempt an orbit, I guess.

I'm gonna use the old Bullet design for the Rocket. Or something simiar.

<FLIGHT LOG: FLIGHT 4372A>

It looks OK on the launchpad... the staging is all set.... hmm. Something seems missing... Ah well. LAUNCH!!

T+00:00:05 LIFTOFF!

T+00:00:07 OH GOD EXPLOSIONS!!!

Struts.... I forgot Struts.....

Struts have been added, Valentina aboard... Ok we are ready!!

T+00:00:00 Liftoff!

T+00:00:05 Seems stable! I think we will be fine!

T+00:00:20 Getting a bit UNSTABLE! (SAS ON)

T+00:00:45 100 M/S!

T+00:01:08 5000 meters in the sky!

T+00:01:30 10000 In the sky!

T+00:02:05 Heard something wierd?

T+00:02:17 Stage 2!

T+00:02:27 Oh.... FUEL CARRIES OVER STAGES??? GODDAMMIT! BACK TO THE DRAWIN BOARD! REST IN PEACE VAL!

T+00:04:03 Splashdown at 593.4 M/S..

I don't like Rapier engines anymore....

Maybe a spaceplane? Worth a shot!

AAAAAAnd I forgot the engines. Back to the drawing board!

IT CRASHED SERIOUSLY?!

At least I saved.

Ok, I got the engines on

A bit bouncy, move the landing gear back..

There!

T+00:00:00: Engines on!

T+00:00:10: AHH IT'S OFF THE RUNWAY!!

Retry again.

T+00:00:00: Engines on!

T+00:00:15: BOOM!

Back to the drawing board.

You know what? Make a rocket again..

dum dum dum doo doo doo

T+00:00:00 Liftoff!

T+00:00:20 Goin quite fast! !

00:00:35: Solid fuel engines out, jettisoning.

00:01:50: Cut off engines.

00:04:19(So close..): Engines on,

00:04:36: Next stage.

00:04:59: ORBIT REACHED! OBJECTIVE COMPLETED!

00:05:20: Hmm, about time to land..

00:33:25: Burn retrograde!

00:38:18: 2nd last stage

00:40:15: Pop the chutes!

00:40:19: Chute open!

00:40:31: TOUCHDOWN! MISSION SUCESS!

I proceeded to plant a flag, and Bill shalt be honored as the first Kerbal to achieve ORBIT!!

Well. I will be working on my 3rd part now.

- - - Updated - - -

"IT CRASHED SERIOUSLY?!"

The GAME crashed. Not the plane.
Woa! That was an averange Wednesday at KSC...

I'm gonna go to the Mun!

- - - Updated - - -

(I'm watching Danny for my training X_X)

I JUST BUILT AN AMAZING ROCKET SO PUMPED :D

(Oh and BTW I got a sattelite into orbit. Dunno how I did it, but I wanna do it again and I JUST CANT SEEM TO GET ANOTHER ONE!)

<FLIGHT LOG T2123>

00:00:00: LAUNCH!!!!!!!

00:00:08: 100 M/S..... Jesus.....

00:00:18: 200 M/S........ Might be a BIT Overpowered.....

00:00:27: 300 M/S.......... Uhm.....

00:00:30: 5000 Meters in the sky! Phenomenal!

00:00:42: 500 M/S AND 10000 Meters Alt. at the same time!

00:01:02: Solid Fuel Engines out of fuel, Seperating!

00:01:04: Damaged the wasted stage.. seperating..

00:01:13: Apoapsis at 100000m, Cutting engines.. Adding maneuver.

00:02:01: Starting prograde burn.

??:??:??: Ship exploded from physwarp..... Ugh........

I loaded from last quicksave..... and lost hours of progress.... WELL *&(@^#*^(@@#&(@#&@#*(&@#*&&@##@

(WE INTURREPT THIS MASS CURSING STAGE BECAUSE OF SWEARING...)

I still have the saved ship.... right??

Ok I do............

God ....ING DAMMIT!!!!!!

I refuse to play without Kerbal Join Reinforcement. Things can break off, but only when under extreme stress. I prefer my rockets to look like actual rockets, not strapped together because KSP can't handle joints. Also need KJR because of the whole KScale 2 bit going on. Needing 4.8Km/s of dV just to make orbit.

Hmm... Cool. I have a spoiler at what's going on for next part..

I have conquered in-atmo planes, I have launched rockets.. But some vehicle is missing.

[quote name='The Flame Cat']Jool? That gas giant with about 3 moons? Pfft. I will start small. Transcontinental rocket flight on Kerbin, then land on the Mun. Then Minmus. Then maybe Duna. THEN I will consider Jool. :P[/QUOTE]

I don't mean to be rude, but can I tell you that Jool has 5 moons?

[quote name='PineCone']I don't mean to be rude, but can I tell you that Jool has 5 moons?[/QUOTE]

Sure, and I (kinda) knew that. I look at the KSP wiki enough.

[COLOR=silver][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]
